title: André Bouvier
text: André Bouvier was a French <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201908%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Lightweight">men's lightweight</a> event at the <a href="1908%20Summer%20Olympics">1908 London Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1908 Summer Olympics, he lost to <a href="Harold%20Holmes%20%28boxer%29">Harold Holmes</a> of Great Britain.
